com.fujitsu.xml.xlink.dataset
Interface XLinkDeclarationList

public interface XLinkDeclarationList

Interface that provides a link declaration information list.

Method Summary
 int getLength()
          The number of held link declaration information items is obtained.
 XLinkDeclaration item(int index)
          Link declaration information in a specified index position is obtained.
 

Method Detail

item

public XLinkDeclaration item(int index)
                      throws java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException
Link declaration information in a specified index position is obtained.
Parameters:
index - Index.
Specify a value not less than 0 and not more than the value obtained by subtracting 1 from getLength().
Returns:
The link declaration information in the index position is returned.
Throws:
java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException - If the index value satisfies one of the following conditions:
  • The index value is negative.
  • The index value exceeds the value obtained by subtracting 1 from the number of held link declaration information items.

getLength

public int getLength()
The number of held link declaration information items is obtained.
Returns:
The number of held link declaration information items is returned.
